name: Impeached 2
description:
In a(nother) surprise victory, you have been elected President of the United States. You now wield the power to push your morals and values upon hundreds of millions of people. Will you be a benevolent leader or a ruthless dictator?

Make laws, fight wars, commit crimes and change the world, all on the taxpayer's dime! Who could ask for anything more?

How long can you stay in power?

Note: This game is political satire, and is not meant to be factually accurate. If you think you could make better content for Impeached 2, check out the Deck Editor!

I have taken the feedback received by Impeached: Be The President constructively, and have changed many things to make the gameplay experience better. Enjoy!

Impeached 2 includes:
– 140+ scenario cards
– 30+ endings with pixel art graphics
– Custom scenario decks & a built-in Deck Editor
– Both chambers of Congress, with accurate election cycles
– Tax income every turn, and a changeable tax rate
– Much, much more!
